title: Deception Is a Weapon in Russiaâ€™s War in Ukraine
description: Both Russia and Ukraine are using confusion as well as artillery on the battlefield. The latest question: Is Russia really retreating from the strategic city of Kherson, as its defense minister says, or is it laying a trap?
dc:creator: Andrew E. Kramer
media:credit: Ivor Prickett for The New York Times
media:description: A commander of a reconnaissance unit of the Ukrainian Territorial Defense Forces, speaking with his men the evening before they went on a frontline operation in the Kherson region, last month.
